root.name: Time Pilot
root.description: GameplayThe goal of the game is to fly around shooting ships while trying to avoid crashing into them or getting hit by their bullets, bombs, or homing missiles. In addition to this the player can rescue fellow pilots (who are parachuting) throughout the level to gain additional points. After the player has shot down 56 normal ships the time periods boss ship will appear. Once the player defeats the boss ship they move on to the next time period, or if the player completed 2001 they loop back to 1910 and the game starts over again with no ending. The time period enemies and bosses are as follows: Time Period Enemy Ships Boss Ship 1910 WWI Biplanes Blimp 1940 WWII Monoplanes B-25 1970 Helicopters CH-47 1982 Jets B-52 2001 UFOs Mothership Time Pilot on Xbox 360Time Pilot was release for the Xbox Live Arcade on August 30th, 2006 at a cost of 400 Microsoft points. It was also released for the Xbox 360 Game Room in 2010 at a cost of 240 Microsoft points.
